headline: Detroit Symphony Names Music Director
abstract: The Italian conductor Jader Bignamini, 43, will succeed Leonard Slatkin next season.
lead_paragraph: When heart surgery in 2018 forced the conductor Leonard Slatkin to miss the final concerts of his decade-long tenure as music director of the Detroit Symphony Orchestra, the ensemble turned to an Italian conductor three decades younger, Jader Bignamini, to step in.
